name: bitwrench
description: A library for misc javascript functions.
author: manu a. chatterjee <deftio@deftio.com> (https://deftio.com/)

scripts.build: ./tools/update-bw-package.js package.json package.json && ./tools/export-bw-default-css.js bitwrench.css && uglifyjs bitwrench.js -o  bitwrench.min.js && npm pack
